import { useState } from "react" import { Row } from "../../row/row" import { Myform } from "../../myform/myform" export const Showtable=()=>{ const [listfrute,setlistfrute]=useState([ {name:"תפוח",color:"green"}, {name:"ענבים",color:"green"}, {name:"לימונים",color:"yellow"}, {name:"אפרסקים",color:"red"} ]) const del=(name)=>{ setlistfrute(listfrute.filter(r=>r.name!=name)) } const add=(event,i)=>{ event.preventDefault setlistfrute(listfrute.concat(i)) } return <> {listfrute.map(m=>( )) }

}
